statements: SELECT * FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT spacecraft_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT spacecraft_id FROM telemetry_data;
SELECT sensor_name, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT sensor_name, MAX(sensor_value) FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY MAX(sensor_value) DESC
SELECT DISTINCT spacecraft_id FROM telemetry_data WHERE sensor_value > 100
SELECT mission_id, COUNT(sensor_name) FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY mission_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_name) > 10
SELECT mission_id, AVG(sensor_value) FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY mission_id ORDER BY AVG(sensor_value) DESC
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT telemetry_data.temperature, spacecraft_info.spacecraft_name FROM telemetry_data INNER JOIN spacecraft_info ON telemetry_data.mission_id = spacecraft_info.mission_id;
SELECT mission_id, temperature FROM telemetry_data WHERE temperature < 0;
SELECT spacecraft_name, launch_date FROM spacecraft_info WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM spacecraft_info ORDER BY launch_date ASC, spacecraft_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE temperature > 50
SELECT mission_id, temperature FROM telemetry_data WHERE pressure < 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT spacecraft_id, spacecraft_name, launch_date FROM spacecraft_info WHERE status = 'Active' AND launch_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT mission_id, timestamp, temperature, pressure FROM telemetry_data JOIN spacecraft_info ON telemetry_data.mission_id = spacecraft_info.mission_id WHERE temperature > 60 AND pressure < 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE temperature <= 30 OR pressure >= 120 ORDER BY pressure DESC, timestamp
SELECT * FROM spacecraft;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM spacecraft ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT spacecraft_id, mission_name, spacecraft_type FROM spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_type = 'Satellite';
SELECT DISTINCT mission_name FROM spacecraft;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_value > 100.0 ORDER BY telemetry_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM spacecraft ORDER BY spacecraft_id DESC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_type = 'Satellite';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, spacecraft_type FROM spacecraft WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, spacecraft_type FROM spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_type = 'Rover' AND launch_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT spacecraft_id, mission_name, launch_date, spacecraft_type FROM spacecraft WHERE mission_name LIKE '%Mars%';
SELECT telemetry_id, mission_name, start_time, end_time, telemetry_data FROM telemetry_data;
SELECT mission_name, start_time, end_time, telemetry_data, telemetry_id FROM telemetry_data;
SELECT craft_id, craft_name, manufacturer, launch_date, capacity FROM spacecraft;
SELECT manufacturer, craft_name, launch_date, capacity, craft_id FROM spacecraft;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, mission_description FROM missions;
SELECT mission_description, launch_date, mission_name, mission_id FROM missions;
SELECT report_id, telemetry_id, report_timestamp, report_text FROM status_reports;
SELECT telemetry_id, report_text, report_timestamp, report_id FROM status_reports;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, start_time, end_time, telemetry_data FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_id > 100 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT mission_name, start_time, end_time FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_name LIKE 'Mars%' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT craft_name, manufacturer, launch_date FROM spacecraft WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM missions WHERE LENGTH(mission_description) > 100 ORDER BY launch_date ASC;

SELECT t.telemetry_id, t.start_time, s.report_timestamp, r.report_text FROM telemetry_data t JOIN status_reports s ON t.telemetry_id = s.telemetry_id JOIN status_reports r ON s.telemetry_id = r.telemetry_id ORDER BY t.start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Spacecraft ORDER BY spacecraft_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM Mission
SELECT spacecraft_name, manufacturer, status FROM Spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_id = 3
SELECT telemetry_type, telemetry_value, timestamp FROM TelemetryData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM EventLog WHERE spacecraft_id = 5
SELECT * FROM Mission ORDER BY mission_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM Mission WHERE mission_status = 'Active'
SELECT spacecraft_name, manufacturer FROM Spacecraft WHERE status = 'Operational' ORDER BY spacecraft_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT telemetry_type, telemetry_value FROM TelemetryData WHERE spacecraft_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM EventLog WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
